English: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, concerning the Word of life
Bahnar: Nhôn chih roi kơ iĕm gah tơdrong Yêsu Krist. Sư dang nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei yua kơ Sư tơbăt ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang. Sư arih adrol kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjing plĕnh teh sơ̆. Nhôn kơtơ̆ng Sư pơma. Nhôn 'bôh Sư păng măt nhôn kơdih păng ti nhôn mơn pel akâu Sư tơpă.

English: the life was manifested, and we have seen, and bear witness, and declare to you that eternal life which was with the Father and was manifested to us
Bahnar: Nhôn 'bôh Yêsu Krist oei tơ teh âu. Sư boih ăn kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang păng 'Bok Kei-Dei. Kơlih kơ nhôn 'bôh Sư tơpă na nhôn gơh roi ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong Sư. Sư arih păng 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆. Sư arih ling-lang ưh pă layơ lôch. Sư jur tơ ala teh âu păng tơ'bôh kơ nhôn akâu Sư.

English: that which we have seen and heard we declare to you, that you also may have fellowship with us; and truly our fellowship is with the Father and with His Son Jesus Christ.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong nhôn 'bôh păng kơtơ̆ng nhôn wă roi ăn kơ iĕm, wă kơ iĕm juăt păng nhôn, na 'Bok Kei-Dei păng Kon Sư Yêsu Krist juăt đĭ-đăng rim 'nu kơ bơ̆n.

English: And these things we write to you that your joy may be full.
Bahnar: Nhôn chih kơ iĕm dôm tơdrong lăm kơthơ âu wă kơ đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n hiôk hơiă tơpă.

English: This is the message which we have heard from Him and declare to you, that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all.
Bahnar: Âu boih tơdrong nhôn kơtơ̆ng đơ̆ng Kon Sư na nhôn roi ăn kơ iĕm: 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi hơdah măt 'năr. Măt 'năr 'noh wă pơchrang hơdah ling-lang, ưh kơ đei layơ măng mu tŏ sĕt.

English: If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
Bahnar: Lu buăl bơ̆n mơ'nah khan 'Bok Kei-Dei juăt păng bơ̆n, mă-lei bơ̆n oei lăm măng mu pơm yoch, 'noh bơ̆n hơlĕnh kơ Sư đĕch, 'bơ̆r đon, tơdrong bơ̆n pơm kư̆m hơlĕnh lei-lăi đĕch.

English: But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n oei lăm hơdah Sư, kư̆m thoi Sư oei lăm hơdah, lei 'bơ̆r đon bơ̆n hiôk hơiă dih băl tơpă. Na pham Kon Sư Yêsu Krist 'nhao rơgoh bơ̆n tôm tơdrong yoch.

English: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n khan bơ̆n ưh kơ đei tơdrong yoch, 'noh bơ̆n kư̆m hơlĕnh kơdih bơ̆n mơ̆n păng 'bơ̆r bơ̆n kư̆m ưh kơ gơh pơma tơpăt tŏ sĕt.

English: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei pơm trŏ thoi Sư pơkă, Sư pơm tơpăt ling-lang. Kơlih kơ thoi noh na bơ̆n dah roi tơdrong yoch bơ̆n kơ Sư, na Sư gô pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch tơpă păng 'nhao jơhngơ̆m bơ̆n đơ̆ng dôm tơdrong kơnê̆.

English: If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n khan bơ̆n ưh kơ đei tơdrong yoch, 'noh dang bơ̆n khan 'Bok Kei-Dei hơlĕnh kơlih kơ bơ̆n bơngai yoch tơpă na Sư khan kơ bơ̆n thoi noh. Dah bơ̆n ling-lang pơma thoi noh, bơ̆n ưh kơ đei layơ gơh băt tơdrong Sư tŏ sĕt.

English: My little children, these things I write to you, so that you may not sin. And if anyone sins, we have an Advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, dang ei inh đei chih ăn kơ iĕm kơthơ âu wă kơ iĕm huay pă pơm yoch. Mă-lei bơngai bu yoch, sư đei minh 'nu Bơngai pơma kơ 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei wă dŏng bơ̆n. Bơngai 'noh anăn Sư Yêsu Krist mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt.

English: And He Himself is the propitiation for our sins, and not for ours only but also for the whole world.
Bahnar: Sư lôch tang bơ̆n wă pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Mă-lei ưh kơ sĭ Sư wă pơklaih kơdrô̆ yoch bơ̆n đĕch ôh, Sư pơklaih đĭ-đăng bơngai ala teh âu mơ̆n.

English: Now by this we know that we know Him, if we keep His commandments.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n răk dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă lei noh bơ̆n lui kơ Sư tơpă.

English: He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
Bahnar: Dah bơngai bu khan: “Inh lui kơ Sư,” sơmă bơngai 'noh ưh kơ răk tơdrong Sư pơkă, bơngai 'noh hơlĕnh đĕch. Sư ưh kơ pơma tơpăt tŏ sĕt ôh.

English: But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him. By this we know that we are in Him.
Bahnar: Sơmă dah bơngai bu răk dôm nơ̆r Sư pơkă, bơngai 'noh băt 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei. Wă kơ bơ̆n băt tơdrong bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist, bơ̆n athei kiơ̆ thoi Sư oei tơ ala teh âu sơ̆.

English: He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.
Bahnar: Sơmă dah bơngai bu răk dôm nơ̆r Sư pơkă, bơngai 'noh băt 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei. Wă kơ bơ̆n băt tơdrong bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist, bơ̆n athei kiơ̆ thoi Sư oei tơ ala teh âu sơ̆.

English: Brethren, I write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh mă juăt păng inh, tơdrong inh chih pơkă kơ iĕm âu ưh kơ sĭ tơdrong 'nao ôh. Tơdrong âu tơdrong so mơ̆n mă đêl pơkă kơ iĕm sơ̆. Tơdrong pơkă so âu tơdrong đe bơtho iĕm boih păng iĕm kơtơ̆ng boih.

English: Again, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.
Bahnar: Mă tơdrong inh chih pơkă kơ iĕm âu 'nao mơ̆n. Yêsu Krist răk tơdrong pơkă âu păng iĕm kư̆m răk tơdrong pơkă âu mơ̆n. Yua kơ iĕm tơm hmơm đơ̆ng măng mu mă-lei dang ei 'brưch rai wă jê̆ hơdah măt 'năr boih păng hơdah jơ̆p hloi.

English: He who says he is in the light, and hates his brother, is in darkness until now.
Bahnar: Tơdrong pơkă 'noh thoi âu: Bơngai bu khan sư oei lăm tơdrong hơdah, sơmă oei hil areh kơ 'nhŏng oh sư ling-lang, bơngai 'noh oei lăm măng mu khơ̆ dang ei đĕch.

English: He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh sư oei lăm tơdrong hơdah tơpă boih. Thoi noh bơ̆n băt kơ sư pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpă.

English: But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
Bahnar: Na dah bơngai bu hil areh kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh sư oei lăm măng mu khŏm khŏm. Sư yak nơnăm lăm măng mu. Sư ưh kơ băt trong sư wă năm tơ yơ kơlih kơ măng mu klơ̆p măt sư.

English: I write to you, little children, Because your sins are forgiven you for His name’s sake.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, inh chih ăn kơ iĕm kơthơ âu kơlih kơ iĕm klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch yua kơ Yêsu lôch tang bơ̆n.

English: I write to you, fathers, Because you have known Him who is from the beginning. I write to you, young men, Because you have overcome the wicked one. I write to you, little children, Because you have known the Father.
Bahnar: Ơ lu mih ma duch nă, inh chih kơ iĕm kơthơ âu kơlih kơ iĕm băt kơ Yêsu Krist mă oei arih đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆. Ơ lu adruh tơdăm, inh chih kơ iĕm kơthơ âu kơlih kơ yang Satan thuơ kơ iĕm boih.

English: I have written to you, fathers, Because you have known Him who is from the beginning. I have written to you, young men, Because you are strong, and the word of God abides in you, And you have overcome the wicked one.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, inh chih kơ iĕm kơlih kơ iĕm băt kơ 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei. Ơ lu mih ma duch nă, inh chih kơ iĕm kơlih kơ iĕm băt kơ Yêsu Krist mă oei arih đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆. Ơ lu adruh tơdăm, inh chih kơ iĕm kơlih kơ iĕm pran kơtang. Iĕm kiơ̆ tơpă dôm nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei, na yang Satan thuơ kơ iĕm boih.

English: Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ kơ 'mêm dôm tơdrong ala teh âu. Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ tơdrong ala teh âu, bơngai 'noh sư ưh kơ 'mêm kơ 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh.

English: For all that is in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong chih roi tơ ala âu lĕch đơ̆ng ala teh: Tơdrong kư̆ kă jơhngơ̆m kon bơngai 'maih pơm, tơdrong kư̆ kă mơ̆n măt kon bơngai 'maih lăng, lơ tơdrong tơpă, mơ'nah đei tơmam yua wă pơang akâu sư kơdih. Dôm tơdrong noh ưh kơ lĕch đơ̆ng 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh, lĕch đơ̆ng lu bơngai ala teh âu đĕch.

English: And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.
Bahnar: Ala teh âu dôm tơdrong kon bơngai 'maih iŏk gô răm, mă-lei dah bơngai bu pơm trŏ thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei wă, bơngai 'noh gô arih ling-lang.

English: Little children, it is the last hour; and as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have come, by which we know that it is the last hour.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, năr tôch wă jê̆ truh boih. Iĕm kơtơ̆ng đơ̆ng sơ̆ boih gah tơdrong bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist gô truh. Na dang ei đei lơ bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist truh boih, thoi noh bơih bơ̆n băt kơ năr tôch wă jê̆ truh.

English: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; but they went out that they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist dang ei, tơm hmơm sơ̆ sư khan sư wă bôl lu bơngai lui tơpă, mă dang ei sư achăng tŭk lu bơ̆n bơngai lui. Dah sư bôl bơ̆n bơngai lui tơpă lei sư bôl bơ̆n ling-lang ưh kơ đei layơ tŭk. Na dang ei sư achăng tŭk bơ̆n tơpă boih, noh bơ̆n băt lơ̆m lu sư ưh kơ đei bu buăl bơ̆n.

English: But you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you know all things.
Bahnar: Gah iĕm, Yêsu Krist mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Sư ăn kơ iĕm Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng na đĭ dôm iĕm băt nhên tơpă gah tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: I have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
Bahnar: Inh chih ăn kơ iĕm kơthơ âu ưh kơ sĭ khan iĕm ưh kơ băt tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh. Inh chih ăn kơ iĕm kơthơ âu yua kơ iĕm băt tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă păng iĕm kư̆m băt tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ hơlĕnh ôh.

English: Who is a liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist who denies the Father and the Son.
Bahnar: Lei bu hơlĕnh lĕ? Bơngai bu khan Yêsu ưh kơ sĭ 'Bok Krist, bơngai 'noh boih hơlĕnh păng bơngai 'noh boih ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist, bơngai 'noh boih achăng tŭk 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei păng Kon Sư mơ̆n.

English: Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu achăng tŭk Kon Sư, bơngai 'noh kư̆m achăng tŭk 'Bă Sư mơ̆n. Bơngai bu lui kơ Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh kư̆m juăt păng 'Bok Kei-Dei mơ̆n.

English: Therefore let that abide in you which you heard from the beginning. If what you heard from the beginning abides in you, you also will abide in the Son and in the Father.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na iĕm athei răk tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei lăm đon iĕm đơ̆ng iĕm kơtơ̆ng tơm hmơm sơ̆. Dah iĕm răk tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei lăm đon iĕm ling-lang lei 'noh iĕm pôm đon păng Kon Sư păng 'Bă Sư 'Bok Kei-Dei mơ̆n.

English: And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.
Bahnar: Thoi noh bơ̆n gô arih ling-lang, kư̆m thoi Yêsu Krist pơkă sơ̆.

English: These things I have written to you concerning those who try to deceive you.
Bahnar: Inh chih ăn kơ iĕm tơdrong âu wă bơtho ăn kơ lu iĕm gah lu bơngai mă juăt chă bơtho hơlĕnh kơ iĕm.

English: But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you will abide in Him.
Bahnar: Gah iĕm Yêsu Krist ăn kơ iĕm Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng boih. Na lăp Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng oei lơ̆m jơhngơ̆m iĕm, iĕm ưh pă wă kơ lu đe noh bơtho iĕm dơ̆ng ôh, kơlih kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng bơtho iĕm tôm tơdrong. Dôm tơdrong Sư bơtho tơpăt ngăl, ưh kơ sĭ Sư bơtho tơdrong hơlĕnh ôh. Thoi noh na iĕm athei răk dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă hŏ wă kơ iĕm lui kơjăp kơ Yêsu Krist.

English: And now, little children, abide in Him, that when He appears, we may have confidence and not be ashamed before Him at His coming.
Bahnar: Iĕm adrin lui kơ Sư khŏm khŏm hŏ, na Sư jur tơ ala teh âu ning-mônh iĕm huay kơ hli. Năr noh kơnh iĕm ưh kơ kăl kơ jăk ôn akâu iĕm tơ yơ yơ ôh yua kơ iĕm huay kơ mơlâu kơ Sư.

English: Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed on us, that we should be called children of God! Therefore the world does not know us, because it did not know Him.
Bahnar: 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă na Sư mah krao bơ̆n kon Sư. Bơ̆n jing kon Sư tơpă. Na kon bơngai ala teh âu ưh kơ băt kơ bơ̆n bơngai thoi yơ ôh kơlih kơ sư ưh kơ băt kơ 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Beloved, now we are children of God; and it has not yet been revealed what we shall be, but we know that when He is revealed, we shall be like Him, for we shall see Him as He is.
Bahnar: Ơ lu bôl buăl mă juăt păng inh tơpă, dang ei bơ̆n kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, sơmă bơ̆n ưh tam băt bơ̆n gô jing thoi yơ ning-mônh. Mă-lei bơ̆n băt tơdrong âu tơpă: Lăp Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu ning-mônh, bơ̆n gô jing thoi Sư, kơlih kơ bơ̆n gô 'bôh Sư tơpă.

English: And everyone who has this hope in Him purifies himself, just as He is pure.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu chang gô Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu, bơngai 'noh pơm dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl, kư̆m thoi Yêsu pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt mơ̆n.

English: Whoever commits sin also commits lawlessness, and sin is lawlessness.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu pơm yoch, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh.

English: And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.
Bahnar: Iĕm băt mơ̆n Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu sơ̆ wă pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Păng Sư ưh kơ lah pơm yoch ôh.

English: Whoever abides in Him does not sin. Whoever sins has neither seen Him nor known Him.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu pôm đon păng Yêsu Krist, bơngai 'noh ưh pă đei pơm yoch dơ̆ng ôh. Bơngai bu oei pơm yoch khŏm khŏm, bơngai 'noh sư ưh kơ lah băt kơ Yêsu.

English: Little children, let no one deceive you. He who practices righteousness is righteous, just as He is righteous.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, 'nĕ lui kơ đe hơlĕnh kơ iĕm khan bơngai lui bơ̆n ưh kơ kăl pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt. Inh khan kơ iĕm thoi âu: Bơngai bu pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, bơngai 'noh đei đon 'lơ̆ng tơpăt kư̆m thoi Yêsu bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt mơ̆n.

English: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that He might destroy the works of the devil.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu oei pơm yoch khŏm khŏm, bơngai 'noh oei kiơ̆ yang Satan đĕch, kơlih kơ yang Satan pơm yoch đơ̆ng tơm hmơm sơ̆. Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei jur tơ ala teh âu sơ̆ wă pơrăm dôm tơdrong yang Satan pơm.

English: Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh sư ưh pă pơm yoch khŏm khŏm dơ̆ng ôh kơlih kơ sư tơpŭ ming 'nao jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei boih. Sư kon 'Bok Kei-Dei na sư ưh kơ gơh pơm yoch kư̆m thoi 'Bă sư 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ pơm yoch.

English: In this the children of God and the children of the devil are manifest: Whoever does not practice righteousness is not of God, nor is he who does not love his brother.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n gơh kơnăl tơduă bơngai bơ̆n, bơngai bu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai bu kon yang Satan sư phara thoi âu: Bơngai bu ưh kơ pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt păng ưh kơ 'mêm kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ sĭ kon 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh.

English: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another
Bahnar: Kư̆m thoi iĕm kơtơ̆ng đe bơtho iĕm đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆ thoi âu: Bơ̆n athei 'mêm mơnat dih băl.

English: not as Cain who was of the wicked one and murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his works were evil and his brother’s righteous.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n ưh kơ gơh pơm thoi Kain ôh. Kain sư kiơ̆ yang Satan, sư pơlôch oh sư pôm mĕ 'bă. Kơlih kơ kiơ Kain pơlôch oh sư? Kơlih kơ sư pơm tơdrong kơnê̆ ling-lang, gah oh sư pơm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt.

English: Do not marvel, my brethren, if the world hates you.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh, tơdah lu bơngai ala teh âu hil areh kơ iĕm, iĕm 'nĕ lăng sư hlĭch tơdrong kiơ hŏ.

English: We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren. He who does not love his brother abides in death.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt bơ̆n jăk đơ̆ng tơdrong lôch boih wă arih ling-lang kơlih kơ bơ̆n 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n. Bơngai bu ưh kơ 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh oei kiơ̆ gah tơdrong lôch.

English: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu hil areh kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, 'noh dang sư wă pơlôch 'nhŏng oh sư mơ̆n. Iĕm băt mơ̆n lu bơngai chă pơlôch đe, ning-mônh sư ưh kơ đei arih ling-lang ôh.

English: By this we know love, because He laid down His life for us. And we also ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt boih Kră Yang Yêsu Krist 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă yua kơ Sư ăn akâu Sư kơdih lôch yua kơ bơ̆n. Thoi noh bơ̆n athei ăn akâu bơ̆n kơdih lôch yua kơ 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n mơ̆n.

English: But whoever has this world’s goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?
Bahnar: Bơngai bu mơdrŏng 'bôh 'nhŏng oh sư dơnuh hin sơmă ưh kơ mơnat ăn tơmam kiơ kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, dah ưh kơ tơdŏng dih băl tơdrong jang, noh thoi yơ khan sư 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei lĕ?

English: My little children, let us not love in word or in tongue, but in deed and in truth.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, tơdrong 'mêm mơnat dih băl, bơ̆n ưh kơ wă 'bơ̆r bơ̆n đĕch ôh mơnat. Bơ̆n athei 'mêm mơnat dih băl păng jơhngơ̆m đon bơ̆n tơpă păng tơdŏng băl tơdrong jang.

English: And by this we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m đon bơ̆n, noh bơ̆n băt bơ̆n kiơ̆ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă boih. Thoi noh na jơhngơ̆m bơ̆n huay pă hli kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei boih.

English: For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.
Bahnar: Phŏ jơhngơ̆m bơ̆n sơ'ngon hli kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ iŏk bơ̆n jing kon Sư. Mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei hơgei hloh kơ bơ̆n tơpă, Sư băt tôm tơdrong. Thoi noh Sư kư̆m băt kơ bơ̆n 'mêm kơ 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n mơ̆n, na Sư băt kơ lu bơ̆n jing kon Sư tơpă boih.

English: Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh mă juăt păng inh, dah bơ̆n băt bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă boih, lei bơ̆n huay pă hli kơ Sư boih hŏ.

English: And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n gĭt tơdrong kiơ, bơ̆n krao khan apinh 'Bok Kei-Dei, Sư gô asong ăn kơ bơ̆n tơpă, kơlih kơ bơ̆n răk dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă păng pơm trŏ dôm tơdrong thoi Sư wă.
Tơdrong Sư wă kơ bơ̆n răk thoi âu: Bơ̆n athei lui kơ Kon Sư Yêsu Krist păng 'mêm mơnat dih băl tơduă bơ̆n, kư̆m thoi Yêsu pơkă kơ bơ̆n sơ̆.

English: Now he who keeps His commandments abides in Him, and He in him. And by this we know that He abides in us, by the Spirit whom He has given us.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu răk dôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă, bơngai 'noh sư pôm đon păng 'Bok Kei-Dei păng 'Bok Kei-Dei gô oei lăm sư. Păng bơ̆n băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei oei lăm bơ̆n yua kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n.

English: Beloved, do not believe every spirit, but test the spirits, whether they are of God; because many false prophets have gone out into the world.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh mă juăt păng inh, iĕm 'nĕ lui kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai mă khan sư đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng pơma hơgei. Iĕm athei jet pơlong lăng sư 'mơ̆i wă kơ băt sư đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei, dah yang nai đĕch ăn kơ sư pơma. Kơlih kơ đei lơ bơngai jơ̆p kơ teh đak chă bơtho, sư khan sư pơtruh nơ̆r sư kơtơ̆ng đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei sơmă sư hơlĕnh đĕch.

English: By this you know the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God
Bahnar: Wă kơ iĕm băt bơngai ayơ đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă iĕm athei tơdra thoi âu: Dah sư khan Yêsu Krist jur jing bơngai tơpă, lei bơngai 'noh đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă.

English: and every spirit that does not confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God. And this is the spirit of the Antichrist, which you have heard was coming, and is now already in the world.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu khan Yêsu Krist ưh kơ jur jing bơngai, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh. Bơngai bu khan thoi noh, sư 'noh ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist. Iĕm kơtơ̆ng boih sơ̆ lu bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist khan gô truh, na dang ei lu sư truh tơ âu tơpă boih.

English: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, gah iĕm kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă, lu bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu Krist thuơ kơ iĕm boih. Lu sư thuơ kơ iĕm kơlih kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng oei lăm lu iĕm, Sư pran hloh kơ yang mă oei lăm lu bơngai ala teh âu.

English: They are of the world. Therefore they speak as of the world, and the world hears them.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai ayăt kơ Yêsu bơtho gah tơdrong ala teh âu ngăl, na lu bơngai ala teh âu mơ̆ng sư kơlih kơ lu sư tơduă bơngai ala teh.

English: We are of God. He who knows God hears us; he who is not of God does not hear us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.
Bahnar: Sơmă bơ̆n kon 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơngai bu băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh sư mơ̆ng bơ̆n. Bơngai bu ưh kơ băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ mơ̆ng bơ̆n ôh. Thoi noh bơ̆n băt bơngai bu kiơ̆ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơpă, bu wă kiơ̆ yang Satan đĕch.

English: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh mă juăt păng inh, bơ̆n athei 'mêm mơnat dih băl yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ lu bơngai mă khŭl kon Sư athei 'mêm mơnat dih băl. Bơngai bu 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh sư kon 'Bok Kei-Dei păng sư băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă.

English: He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu ưh kơ 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh, yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư gah tơdrong 'mêm mơnat đĕch.

English: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei tơ'bôh kơ bơ̆n tơdrong Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă thoi âu: Sư wơh Kon pôm Sư jur tơ ala teh âu wă kơ Sư lôch tang bơ̆n, wă kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang hăm Sư.

English: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
Bahnar: Âu boih tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n: Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n mah ăn Kon pôm Sư lôch tang bơ̆n, pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Bơ̆n 'mêm kơ Sư ưh kơ đei dang noh ôh.

English: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh mă juăt păng inh, 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n dang noh, na bơ̆n athei 'mêm mơnat dih băl tơduă bơ̆n.

English: No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God abides in us, and His love has been perfected in us.
Bahnar: Ưh tam đei bu 'bôh 'Bok Kei-Dei, sơmă dah bơ̆n 'mêm mơnat dih băl, 'noh yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei oei hơdai păng bơ̆n păng ăn kơ bơ̆n đei đon 'mêm mơnat kư̆m thoi Sư 'mêm mơnat mơ̆n.

English: By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt tơpă boih gah tơdrong bơ̆n pôm đon păng 'Bok Kei-Dei păng tơdrong Sư oei lăm bơ̆n kơlih kơ Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Sư.

English: And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as Savior of the world.
Bahnar: Nhôn 'bôh tơpă tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei wơh Kon Sư jur tơ ala teh âu wă dŏng pơklaih đĭ-đăng kon bơngai, thoi noh na nhôn gơh roi kơ đe Kon Sư jur tơpă.

English: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu khan Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, 'Bok Kei-Dei oei lăm bơngai 'noh, bơngai 'noh sư pôm đon păng 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă boih.

English: And we have known and believed the love that God has for us. God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt kơ Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă. 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư gah tơdrong 'mêm mơnat đĕch, na bơngai bu 'mêm mơnat kơ đe tơpă, bơngai 'noh pôm đon păng 'Bok Kei-Dei păng 'Bok Kei-Dei oei lăm sư.

English: Love has been perfected among us in this: that we may have boldness in the day of judgment; because as He is, so are we in this world.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ bơ̆n 'mêm kơ Sư tơpă wă kơ bơ̆n huay kơ hli kơplah năr Sư wă sek tơlang ning-mônh. Bơ̆n ưh kơ hli kơlih kơ bơ̆n oei arih tơ ala teh âu dang ei kư̆m lei-lăi thoi Yêsu arih mơ̆n.

English: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment. But he who fears has not been made perfect in love.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă, bơngai 'noh huay kơ hli kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ôh. Thoi noh na bơngai bu oei hli, bơngai 'noh tam mă 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei mă tơpă, yua kơ bơngai 'noh sư hli kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei wă phak sư ning-mônh.

English: We love Him because He first loved us.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei kơlih kơ Sư 'mêm kơ bơ̆n adrol.

English: If someone says, “I love God,” and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?
Bahnar: Bơngai bu khan sư 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei mă-lei oei hil areh kơ 'nhŏng oh sư, bơngai 'noh hơlĕnh đĕch. Dah sư ưh kơ 'mêm kơ 'nhŏng oh sư mă oei hơdai ling-lang, thoi yơ sư gơh 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei mă sư ưh kơ 'bôh.

English: And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves God must love his brother also.
Bahnar: Na Yêsu Krist bơtho pơkă kơ bơ̆n thoi âu: Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh athei 'mêm mơnat kơ 'nhŏng oh sư mơ̆n.

English: Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God, and everyone who loves Him who begot also loves him who is begotten of Him.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu lui kơ Yêsu 'Bok Krist mă 'Bok Kei-Dei wơh wă dŏng pơklaih bơ̆n, bơngai 'noh kon 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ 'bă đe, bơngai 'noh kư̆m 'mêm kơ kon đe mơ̆n.

English: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep His commandments.
Bahnar: Thoi noh dah bơ̆n 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei păng răk dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă, lei bơ̆n kư̆m 'mêm kơ lu kon Sư lei-lăi mơ̆n.

English: For this is the love of God, that we keep His commandments. And His commandments are not burdensome.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei lei bơ̆n athei răk dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă. Dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă noh ưh kơ gleh ôh.

English: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.
Bahnar: Kơlih kơ dôm tơdrong lĕch đơ̆ng ala teh âu jei lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei ngăl. Dôm lu tơdrong lĕch đơ̆ng ala teh âu thuơ kơ bơ̆n kơlih kơ bơ̆n lui kơjăp.

English: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong ala teh âu thuơ kơ bu? Dôm tơdrong ala teh âu thuơ kơ lu bơngai mă lui kơ Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: This is He who came by water and blood—Jesus Christ; not only by water, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who bears witness, because the Spirit is truth.
Bahnar: Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu Sư iŏk 'batem hăm đak păng Sư lôch tuh pham yua kơ bơ̆n, ưh kơ sĭ tơdrong iŏk 'batem đĕch ôh, tơdrong Sư tuh pham yua kơ bơ̆n mơ̆n.

English: For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.
Bahnar: Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng kư̆m roi kơ bơ̆n thoi noh wă kơ bơ̆n băt Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă. Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Sư pơma ling-lang tơpăt ngăl.

English: And there are three that bear witness on earth: the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.
Bahnar: Đei pêng tơdrong roi gah Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei: Mă mônh Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng, mă 'bar đak 'batem, mă pêng Sư tuh pham. Pêng tơdrong âu tơhlôh ăn kơ bơ̆n băt Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă.

English: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is the witness of God which He has testified of His Son.
Bahnar: Thoi bơ̆n lui kơ buăl bơ̆n bơngai mă pơma tơpăt ling-lang, sư roi kơ bơ̆n na bơ̆n lui kơ sư roi, thoi noh bơ̆n athei lui kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei mă loi yua kơ Sư pơma tơpăt ngăl. Na pêng tơdrong 'noh hei đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư roi tơbăt ăn kơ bơ̆n Yêsu Kon Sư tơpă.

English: He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu lui kơ Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh lăm to sư, sư băt tơpă gah tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei tơbăt gah Kon Sư. Bơngai bu ưh kơ lui kơ nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei pơma, bơngai 'noh sư khan 'Bok Kei-Dei hơlĕnh kơlih kơ sư ưh kơ lui kơ nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei pơma gah Kon Sư.

English: And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei pơma gah Kon Sư thoi âu: Sư wă kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang păng Sư. Bơ̆n gô arih ling-lang tơpă dah bơ̆n lui kơ Kon Sư.

English: He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu lui kơ Kon Sư, bơngai 'noh gô arih ling-lang păng 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơngai bu ưh kơ lui kơ Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơngai 'noh ưh kơ gơh arih ling-lang păng Sư ôh.

English: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.
Bahnar: Inh chih kơ iĕm kơthơ âu kơ lu iĕm bơngai mă lui kơ Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ iĕm băt nhên iĕm gô arih ling-lang păng 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Now this is the confidence that we have in Him, that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n gơh krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei kơlih kơ bơ̆n băt kơ Sư mơ̆ng bơ̆n tơpă dah bơ̆n apinh trŏ thoi Sư wă.

English: And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n băt kơ Sư mơ̆ng bơ̆n apinh tơdrong kiơ kiơ, lei bơ̆n kư̆m băt kơ Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong noh mơ̆n.

English: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin which does not lead to death, he will ask, and He will give him life for those who commit sin not leading to death. There is sin leading to death. I do not say that he should pray about that.
Bahnar: Dah iĕm 'bôh 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n bơngai lui sư pơm yoch iĕm athei krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei kơ sư, na 'Bok Kei-Dei gô ăn kơ sư arih ling-lang. Sơmă đei 'bar khŭl tơdrong yoch. Minh khŭl noh bơ̆n 'bôh 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n pơm yoch, athei krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm sư. Minh khŭl dơ̆ng bơ̆n 'bôh 'nhŏng oh bơ̆n pơm yoch khŏm khŏm, inh ưh kơ đei athei iĕm krao khan tơgŭm sư dơ̆ng ôh. Bơngai bu pơm yoch thoi noh sư gô răm tơpă.

English: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin not leading to death.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong ưh kơ trŏ kơ tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei, tơdrong yoch ngăl. Sơmă đei 'bar khŭl yoch.

English: We know that whoever is born of God does not sin; but he who has been born of God keeps himself, and the wicked one does not touch him.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt boih dôm lu bơ̆n kon 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ gơh pơm yoch khŏm khŏm ôh kơlih kơ Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, Sư wei-lăng bơ̆n, na yang Satan ưh kơ gơh pơrăm lu bơ̆n ôh.

English: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies under the sway of the wicked one.
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n kư̆m băt bơ̆n kon 'Bok Kei-Dei boih păng bơ̆n băt đĭ-đăng dôm lu bơngai mă lĕch đơ̆ng ala teh âu mă ưh kơ lui kơ Kon Sư, yang Satan pơgơ̆r lu sư.

English: And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us an understanding, that we may know Him who is true; and we are in Him who is true, in His Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God and eternal life.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt Kon pôm 'Bok Kei-Dei jur tơ bơ̆n boih. Sư roi tơbăt ăn kơ bơ̆n tôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei Kră Yang tơm tơpă. Bơ̆n pôm đon păng Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei păng pôm đon păng Kon Sư Yêsu Krist mơ̆n. Yêsu Krist Sư kư̆m Kră Yang tơpă mơ̆n na Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang.

English: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon hơ'lơ̆p, iĕm athei weh ataih đơ̆ng dôm tơdrong yang kơnê̆ hŏ.
